item.description:
Let's grab lunch at the Haley House and support our local businesses at the ArtROX! Holiday Pop-Up Shop. We'll meet and greet over lunch then walk down the street to the old Foot Locker building where the pop-up is located.

From the ArtRox! website:

"Buy in the 'Bury and support local artists and craftspeople at the ArtROX! Holiday Pop-up Shop. This unique holiday show features artists from around Greater Roxbury and beyond selling fine art, crafts, and designs fitting a variety of budgets, sizes, and tastes.

Vendors wishing to sell their work in the pop-up shop should read the information below. Questions may be directed to Laura Palmer Edwards at 617-427-1006 or laura@discoverroxbury.org."

***The pop-up shop runs from November to December, 4 days a week so if you can't make this event, you can still support our businesses another time.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the cashier for the meetup table. It's not a big venue so you'll probably spot as you come in.
item.name: ArtROX! Holiday Pop-Up Shop and Lunch
